explains: v. （使）旋转，转动；使轻快地转动；（用手指）缠绕，捻弄
n. 转动，旋转（一周）；螺旋形曲线；旋转的东西

sentences.en: When I twirl this around, it produces a particular tone.
sentences.cn: 当我把这个旋转时，它会发出特殊的音调。

sentences.en: A small boy appears utterly confused as the ears twirl apparently at random above him.
sentences.cn: 一个小男孩看起来非常困惑，而他的耳朵在他上方随意地转动着。

sentences.en: Kate did a twirl in her new dress.
sentences.cn: 凯特穿着新连衣裙转了一圈。
